name: Slimy Situation (TonyLuu)
description:
A wise slime knows that when adventurers are nearby, it's best to run away! 

Your peaceful slime cave  has been invaded by hopeful adventurers looking for loot and XP.  Use your wits to escape without being caught or running out of slime in this 2D pixelated stealth game:

  • Slow down the adventurers by leaving behind your handy slime trail., but be careful not to run out of slime!
  • Recover your slime by going over your trail.
  • Puddles will not drain your slime.

Controls

W, A, S, D Keys to move up, left, down, right respectively
